item.title: Announcement – 12/05/2024
item.description:
THE CHURCH IN CANBERRA 12th May 2024

ANNOUNCEMENTS – THE CHURCH IN CANBERRA 
12th May 2024

WEEKLY HIGHLIGHTS 
1. SMALL GROUP MEETINGS THIS WEEK

English speaking - Thursday 7 pm
Venue: Gungahlin House
Topic: The All-inclusive Christ as the Good Land - a Land of Waterbrooks, of Springs and of Fountains, Flowing Forth in Valleys and in Mountains

Chinese speaking - Wednesday 6:30 pm
Venue: Ming & Nadia's House (Palmerston)
Topic: The All-inclusive Christ as the Good Land - a Land of Waterbrooks, of Springs and of Fountains, Flowing Forth in Valleys and in Mountains

2. NEXT LOVE FEAST AT THE HALL

Date: 19th May
Venue: Meeting Hall (after prophesying meeting)
All saints are welcome to join the love feast. Let's take this opportunity to cherish one another while enjoying mutual fellowship. The love feast will be followed by the monthly coordination meeting for those who wish to join.

3. HOLY WORD FOR MORNING REVIVAL (HWMR) 

Week 4 commencing Monday
HWMR title: Laboring on the All-Inclusive Christ Typified by the Good Land for the Building Up of the Church as the Body of Christ, for the Reality and the Manifestation of the Kingdom, and for the Bride to Make Herself Ready for the Lord’s Coming
Week 4 title: The All-inclusive Christ as the Good Land - a Land of Waterbrooks, of Springs and of Fountains, Flowing Forth in Valleys and in Mountains


4. LIFE STUDY PURSUIT

Life Study of First Corinthians Messages 3 & 4

TRAINING & CONFERENCES 

1. MONTHLY PERFECTING TRAINING 2024

Dates: 20 July, 7 September, and 16 November (There will be no training in the other months because of other conferences or the Bi-annual Perfecting Training)
Venue: Meeting Hall Cluster
Registration: Click Here

2. NATIONAL HIGH SCHOOLERS CONFERENCE

Dates: Friday 5 July to Monday 8 July 2024
Location: The Tops Conference Centre
Registration Deadline: 27 May 2024
Registration and Further information: click here 
Cost: $290
Notes: Please see the notes on the website regarding year 6 registration and serving. Please fellowship with Billy Steer before registering to serve.

3. NATIONAL UNIVERSITY AGED CONFERENCE (NUAC)

Blending Trip
Dates: Thursday 11 July to Friday 12 July 2024
Location: Commencing at Church in Brisbane meeting hall
Cost: $55

NUAC 
Dates:  Friday 12 July to Monday 15 July 2024
Location: Sunshine Coast Recreation Centre
Cost: $295

Registration and Further information: click here 
Registration Deadline: 9 June 2024
 

4. CAIRNS BLENDING CONFERENCE 2024

Dates: 26th & 28th of July
Location: Ramada Hotel 6/12 Florence St, Cairns City QLD 4870.
Training Cost: $350 per person
Schedule: Starts - Friday,7:30PM 26/07/24 Ends - Lord's Day, After lunch, 28/7/2024
Registration: Click here

5. TEACHERS TRAINING & PARENTS AND SERVING ONES CONFERENCE

Teachers Training
Date: Friday, 30 August 2024
Parents' and Serving Ones' Conference
Dates: Saturday, 31 August 2024 - Lord's day, 1 September 2024

Location: Physically held in Sydney and online, via Zoom. 
Registration Deadline: Monday, 12 August 2023.
Registration: (registration will open early June)
Training Cost: $25 for those attending the Teachers' Training physically
                         $50 for those attending the Parents' and Serving Ones' Conference physically.
                         $10 for those attending on Zoom from Australia.

6. ADELAIDE BLENDING CONFERENCE

Date: 27th - 29th September 2024
Locations:
Conference - Victor Harbour Recreation Centre, 5 George Main Rd, Victor Harbor, SA 5211
Accommodation - Bluff Resort Apartment, 123 Franklin Parade, Encounter Bay, SA 5211
Preliminary Information: Click here

INTERNATIONAL ANNOUNCEMENTS
 

1. BIBLE DISTRIBUTION AT THE SUMMER 2024 PARIS OLYMPICS

The Olympics will be returning to Europe in 2024 and will be hosted in Paris, France. We believe this is a wonderful opportunity prepared by the Lord as the Lord of the harvest. The saints are preparing to distribute free copies of the New Testament Recovery Version during the Torch Relay and the Olympic and Paralympic Games.

During the torch relay there will be 9 gospel trips visiting 11 French cities. There will be another 5 gospel trips during the Olympic Games. 

For more details, please click here.

2. YOUNG PEOPLE'S TRAINING 2024 (NEW ZEALAND)

Dates: Monday 24th June to Friday 28th June 2024
Location: New Zealand Training Centre
For more details, please click here.

This training is open to all university aged and young working saints. This training will be a foretaste of the Full-time Training, similar to the Jubilee Week.

AUDIO AND VIDEO RECORDINGS FROM RECENT TRAININGS AND CONFERENCES 

1. Encouraging the saints to get into the Life Studies (By Brother Minoru Chen)

LSM app for reading 500 life-studies is ready to download click here.

GENERAL INFORMATION


A. REGULAR MEETINGS OF THE CHURCH

Prayer Meeting (English)
Tuesday 7:30pm at the meeting hall and on Zoom (details below).
Prayer Meeting (Chinese)
Friday 9pm on WeChat. If you wish to attend please contact Mark Lam or Sister Zhi Bing and they will add you to the WeChat group.
Lord's Table and Prophesying Meeting
Lord's Day 10:00am at the meeting hall and on Zoom (details below).

B. COORDINATION MEETING 

Next Meeting: 19th May 2024 (after prophesying meeting)
Book: The Tree of Life - Message 2
Future Dates: click here

This meeting is open to saints serving (or endeavouring to serve) and is predominantly a time to enjoy the Lord so that we may be built up together in our service. We strongly encourage the saints to read the chapter listed above in your personal time. We will share and fellowship on this chapter during the meeting. There will be Zoom available for those who cannot join physically.

C. CALENDAR FROM THE CHURCH IN SYDNEY

Click here for the calendar of yearly events. We encourage us all to consider before the Lord the various events this year for our enjoyment and perfecting. By His grace, let us be positively aggressive to set aside our time and work for this.

D. CHURCH IN CANBERRA VARIOUS OFFERING ACCOUNTS

Please click here

E. ZOOM MEETING DETAILS

To join, click this link https://us02web.zoom.us/j/86759516115?pwd=RGQrKzJWWkRtTXVkeS9ZNXdSSmwxdz09
Meeting ID: 867 5951 6115 
Passcode: Eph4:16

F. ONLINE ANNOUNCEMENT

The announcement page on the church in Canberra website (https://www.churchincanberra.org/announcements) requires the password, 'canberra'.

G. LIST OF ACT SUBURBS AND DISTRICTS 

Through the burden released at recent conferences and the prayer of the saints we look to the Lord for the increase of his testimony in Canberra. There is the need for much prayer that the Lord would gain his testimony across the whole of the ACT. The document linked here contains a full list of the ACT Districts and Divisions (Suburbs) to aid in your prayer for his move in Canberra.

Past announcements can be found at the church website: https://www.churchincanberra.org/announcements 

(Please refer to weekly email announcement for login password) 

 

From coordinating ones, on behalf of the Church in Canberra 







This email was sent to <<Email Address>>
why did I get this?    unsubscribe from this list    update subscription preferences
Church in Canberra · Stokes St · Griffith · Canberra, Act 2603 · Australia

To join, click this link https://us02web.zoom.us/j/86759516115?pwd=RGQrKzJWWkRtTXVkeS9ZNXdSSmwxdz09

G. LIST OF ACT SUBURBS AND DISTRICTS 

Through the burden released at recent conferences and the prayer of the saints we look to the Lord for the increase of his testimony in Canberra. There is the need for much prayer that the Lord would gain his testimony across the whole of the ACT. The document linked here contains a full list of the ACT Districts and Divisions (Suburbs) to aid in your prayer for his move in Canberra.

From coordinating ones, on behalf of the Church in Canberra

item.title: Announcement – 28/04/2024
item.description:
THE CHURCH IN CANBERRA 28th April 2024

ANNOUNCEMENTS – THE CHURCH IN CANBERRA 
28th April 2024

WEEKLY HIGHLIGHTS 

1. SMALL GROUP MEETINGS THIS WEEK

English speaking - Thursday 7 pm
Venue: Steer's House (Banks)
Topic: Inheriting the All-inclusive Christ as the Good Land by Taking Heed to His Words of Advice and Warnings and by Receiving His Renewed Training to Have Our Inner Man Renewed Day by Day.

Chinese speaking - Wednesday 6:30 pm
Venue: Ming & Nadia's House (Palmerston)
Topic: Inheriting the All-inclusive Christ as the Good Land by Taking Heed to His Words of Advice and Warnings and by Receiving His Renewed Training to Have Our Inner Man Renewed Day by Day.

2. NEXT LOVE FEAST AT THE HALL

Date: 19th May
Venue: Meeting Hall (after prophesying meeting)
All saints are welcome to join the love feast. Let's take this opportunity to cherish one another while enjoying mutual fellowship. The love feast will be followed by the monthly coordination meeting for those who wish to join.

3.  CHURCH OUTING

There will be a church outing to Cotter Dam on the 4th of May. All saints as well as gospel contacts and new ones are encouraged to join.

Please confirm your attendance (for catering purposes) by filling out the form here.

Location: Cotter Dam (click here for maps)
Time/date: 10:00am- 1:00pm 4th of May
Food: The church will provide BBQ meat and bread. Saints are encouraged to bring salads, fruit, snacks and drinks.
What to bring: Hat, picnic blanket, sports equipment.

4. LIFE STUDY PURSUIT

Life Study of Song of Songs Messages 9 & 10

TRAINING & CONFERENCES 

1. MONTHLY PERFECTING TRAINING 2024

Dates: 11 May, 20 July, 7 September, and 16 November (There will be no training in the other months because of other conferences or the Bi-annual Perfecting Training)
Venue: Meeting Hall Cluster
Registration: Click Here

2. NATIONAL HIGH SCHOOLERS CONFERENCE

Dates: Friday 5 July to Monday 8 July 2024
Location: The Tops Conference Centre
Registration Deadline: 27 May 2024
Registration and Further information: click here 
Cost: $290
Notes: Please see the notes on the website regarding year 6 registration and serving. Please fellowship with Billy Steer before registering to serve.

3. NATIONAL UNIVERSITY AGED CONFERENCE (NUAC)

Blending Trip
Dates: Thursday 11 July to Friday 12 July 2024
Location: Commencing at Church in Brisbane meeting hall
Cost: $55

NUAC 
Dates:  Friday 12 July to Monday 15 July 2024
Location: Sunshine Coast Recreation Centre
Cost: $295

Registration and Further information: click here 
Registration Deadline: 9 June 2024
 

4. PERTH BLENDING CONFERENCE 2024

Dates: 26th- 28th April
Location: Camp Wattle Grove, Perth https://mail.campwattlegrove.com.au 
Training Cost: $100 Adult, $50 for children (ages 4-12)
Registration: Click here
Enquiry: All other registration enquiries for saints from interstate should be directed to Tony Cleary 0459 239 879.

5. TASMANIA BLENDING CONFERENCE 2024

Dates: 3rd May- 5th May 2024
Location: Poatina Chalet, Gordon St, Poatina 7302, Tasmania 
Training Cost: $250.00 per adult 14 years old and above
$130.00 per child from 3 to 13 years old. Free for children under 3 years old. The price will be capped for families at 2 adults, 2 children ($760)
Registration Deadline: 7th April 2024
Registration: Click here

6. CAIRNS BLENDING CONFERENCE 2024

Dates: 26th & 28th of July
Location: Ramada Hotel 6/12 Florence St, Cairns City QLD 4870.
Training Cost: $350 per person
Schedule: Starts - Friday,7:30PM 26/07/24 Ends - Lord's Day, After lunch, 28/7/2024
Registration: Click here

7. TEACHERS TRAINING & PARENTS AND SERVING ONES CONFERENCE

Teachers Training
Date: Friday, 30 August 2024
Parents' and Serving Ones' Conference
Dates: Saturday, 31 August 2024 - Lord's day, 1 September 2024

Location: Physically held in Sydney and online, via Zoom. 
Registration Deadline: Monday, 12 August 2023.
Registration: (registration will open early June)
Training Cost: $25 for those attending the Teachers' Training physically
                         $50 for those attending the Parents' and Serving Ones' Conference physically.
                         $10 for those attending on Zoom from Australia.

INTERNATIONAL ANNOUNCEMENTS
 

1. PARTICIPATION IN THE SUMMER 2024 PARIS OLYMPIC DISTRIBUTION 

The Olympics will be returning to Europe in 2024 and will be hosted in Paris, France. We believe this is a wonderful opportunity prepared by the Lord as the Lord of the harvest. The saints are preparing to distribute free copies of the New Testament Recovery Version during the Torch Relay and the Olympic and Paralympic Games.

During the torch relay there will be 9 gospel trips visiting 11 French cities. There will be another 5 gospel trips during the Olympic Games. 

For more details, please click here.

2. YOUNG PEOPLE'S TRAINING 2024 (NEW ZEALAND)

Dates: Monday 24th June to Friday 28th June 2024
Location: New Zealand Training Centre
For more details, please click here.

This training is open to all university aged and young working saints. This training will be a foretaste of the Full-time Training, similar to the Jubilee Week.

AUDIO AND VIDEO RECORDINGS FROM RECENT TRAININGS AND CONFERENCES 

1. Encouraging the saints to get into the Life Studies (By Brother Minoru Chen)

LSM app for reading 500 life-studies is ready to download click here.

GENERAL INFORMATION


A. REGULAR MEETINGS OF THE CHURCH

Prayer Meeting (English)
Tuesday 7:30pm at the meeting hall and on Zoom (details below).
Prayer Meeting (Chinese)
Friday 9pm on WeChat. If you wish to attend please contact Mark Lam or Sister Zhi Bing and they will add you to the WeChat group.
Lord's Table and Prophesying Meeting
Lord's Day 10:00am at the meeting hall and on Zoom (details below).

B. COORDINATION MEETING 

Next Meeting: 19th May 2024 (after prophesying meeting)
Book: The Tree of Life - Message 2
Future Dates: click here

This meeting is open to saints serving (or endeavouring to serve) and is predominantly a time to enjoy the Lord so that we may be built up together in our service. We strongly encourage the saints to read the chapter listed above in your personal time. We will share and fellowship on this chapter during the meeting. There will be Zoom available for those who cannot join physically.

C. CALENDAR FROM THE CHURCH IN SYDNEY

Click here for the calendar of yearly events. We encourage us all to consider before the Lord the various events this year for our enjoyment and perfecting. By His grace, let us be positively aggressive to set aside our time and work for this.

D. CHURCH IN CANBERRA VARIOUS OFFERING ACCOUNTS

Please click here

E. ZOOM MEETING DETAILS

To join, click this link https://us02web.zoom.us/j/86759516115?pwd=RGQrKzJWWkRtTXVkeS9ZNXdSSmwxdz09
Meeting ID: 867 5951 6115 
Passcode: Eph4:16

F. ONLINE ANNOUNCEMENT

The announcement page on the church in Canberra website (https://www.churchincanberra.org/announcements) requires the password, 'canberra'.

G. LIST OF ACT SUBURBS AND DISTRICTS 

Through the burden released at recent conferences and the prayer of the saints we look to the Lord for the increase of his testimony in Canberra. There is the need for much prayer that the Lord would gain his testimony across the whole of the ACT. The document linked here contains a full list of the ACT Districts and Divisions (Suburbs) to aid in your prayer for his move in Canberra.

Past announcements can be found at the church website: https://www.churchincanberra.org/announcements 

(Please refer to weekly email announcement for login password) 

 

From coordinating ones, on behalf of the Church in Canberra 







This email was sent to <<Email Address>>

The Olympics will be returning to Europe in 2024 and will be hosted in Paris, France. We believe this is a wonderful opportunity prepared by the Lord as the Lord of the harvest. The saints are preparing to distribute free copies of the New Testament Recovery Version during the Torch Relay and the Olympic and Paralympic Games.

During the torch relay there will be 9 gospel trips visiting 11 French cities. There will be another 5 gospel trips during the Olympic Games. 

For more details, please click here.

AUDIO AND VIDEO RECORDINGS FROM RECENT TRAININGS AND CONFERENCES 

1. Parents and Serving One's Conference 2023 click here

2. Encouraging the saints to get into the Life Studies (By Brother Minoru Chen)

LSM app for reading 500 life-studies is ready to download click here.

GENERAL INFORMATION


A. REGULAR MEETINGS OF THE CHURCH

Prayer Meeting (English)
Tuesday 7:30pm at the meeting hall and on Zoom (details below).
Prayer Meeting (Chinese)
Friday 9pm on WeChat. If you wish to attend please contact Mark Lam or Sister Zhi Bing and they will add you to the WeChat group.
Lord's Table and Prophesying Meeting
Lord's Day 10:00am at the meeting hall and on Zoom (details below).

B. COORDINATION MEETING 

Next Meeting: 21st April 2024 (after prophesying meeting)
Book: the tree of life - Message 1
Future Dates: click here

This meeting is open to saints serving (or endeavouring to serve) and is predominantly a time to enjoy the Lord so that we may be built up together in our service. We strongly encourage the saints to read the chapter listed above in your personal time. We will share and fellowship on this chapter during the meeting. There will be Zoom available for those who cannot join physically.

C. CALENDAR FROM THE CHURCH IN SYDNEY

Click here for the calendar of yearly events. We encourage us all to consider before the Lord the various events this year for our enjoyment and perfecting. By His grace, let us be positively aggressive to set aside our time and work for this.

D. CHURCH IN CANBERRA VARIOUS OFFERING ACCOUNTS

Please click here

E. ZOOM MEETING DETAILS

To join, click this link https://us02web.zoom.us/j/86759516115?pwd=RGQrKzJWWkRtTXVkeS9ZNXdSSmwxdz09
Meeting ID: 867 5951 6115 
Passcode: Eph4:16

F. ONLINE ANNOUNCEMENT

The announcement page on the church in Canberra website (https://www.churchincanberra.org/announcements) requires the password, 'canberra'.

G. LIST OF ACT SUBURBS AND DISTRICTS 

Through the burden released at recent conferences and the prayer of the saints we look to the Lord for the increase of his testimony in Canberra. There is the need for much prayer that the Lord would gain his testimony across the whole of the ACT. The document linked here contains a full list of the ACT Districts and Divisions (Suburbs) to aid in your prayer for his move in Canberra.

Past announcements can be found at the church website: https://www.churchincanberra.org/announcements 

(Please refer to weekly email announcement for login password) 

 

From coordinating ones, on behalf of the Church in Canberra

item.title: Church Outing - May 4th
item.description:
Church Outing - May 4th

Church Outing - May 4th


Praise the Lord Saints,

There will be a church outing to Cotter Dam on the 4th of May. All saints as well as gospel contacts and new ones are encouraged to join.

Please let us know you are coming by filling in the form here.

Location: Cotter Dam (click here for maps)
Time/date: 10:00am- 1:00pm 4th of May
Food: The church will provide BBQ meat and bread. Saints are encouraged to bring salads, fruit, snacks and drinks.
What to bring: Hat, picnic blanket, sports equipment.

In Him,

The Brothers in Canberra

Thank the Lord for His Arrangement. The saints in the corporate living in Kaleen found a new house to stay. This new house will just be the unit next door (house they share driveway with). The Date of move will be on April 13 (Saturday). There are a number of saints who are not around that time so we ask those who are available to help out in the move. Please let Brother James or Sister Lahra know if you can lend a hand in moving things.

WEEKLY HIGHLIGHTS 

1. LORD'S DAY  SCHEDULE FOR 31st OF MARCH

All saints are welcome for breakfast at 8am in the meeting hall and are encourage to join session 4 at 9am of  Canberra Retreat 2024.
Lord's Table will begin at 10:30am and will be followed by lunch (lovefeast).  

2. SMALL GROUP MEETINGS THIS WEEK

English speaking - Thursday 7 pm
Venue: Steer's House
Topic: Knowing the All-inclusive Christ and Growing with the Growth of God

Chinese speaking - Wednesday 6:30 pm
Contact Zhi Bing or Mark Lam for the location.

3. CALENDAR FROM THE CHURCH IN SYDNEY

Click here for the calendar of yearly events. We encourage us all to consider before the Lord the various events this year for our enjoyment and perfecting. By His grace, let us be positively aggressive to set aside our time and work for this.

4. LIFE STUDY PURSUIT

Life Study of Philemon Messages 1 & 2

TRAINING & CONFERENCES 

1. MID-SEMESTER RETREAT

Students from Sydney and Newcastle will be coming to Canberra from the 29th-30th of March for a mid-semester retreat. University students and young working saints are encouraged to join this time. Local saints are also encouraged to stay in Canberra over the long weekend for the fellowship, blending, and giving hospitality during the retreat.

Dates: 29th-30th of March
Venue: Church in Canberra Meeting Hall
Cost: (for Canberra and Wagga) - $15, pay on arrival
Schedule: Click here 
Registration: Click here
Please let Brother Billy know if you can open your house for accommodation.

2. MONTHLY PERFECTING TRAINING 2024

Dates: 13 April, 11 May, 20 July, 7 September, and 16 November (There will be no training in the other months because of other conferences or the Bi-annual Perfecting Training)
Venue: Physical cluster at the Church in Canberra Meeting Hall or via Zoom platform
Registration: Click Here

3. PERTH BLENDING CONFERENCE 2024

Dates: 26th- 28th April
Location: Camp Wattle Grove, Perth https://mail.campwattlegrove.com.au 
Training Cost: $100 Adult, $50 for children (ages 4-12)
Registration: Click here
Enquiry: All other registration enquiries for saints from interstate should be directed to Tony Cleary 0459 239 879.

4. TASMANIA BLENDING CONFERENCE 2024

Dates: 3rd May- 5th May 2024
Location: Poatina Chalet, Gordon St, Poatina 7302, Tasmania 
Training Cost: $250.00 per adult 14 years old and above
$130.00 per child from 3 to 13 years old. Free for children under 3 years old. The price will be capped for families at 2 adults, 2 children ($760)
Registration Deadline: 7th April 2024
Registration: Click here

5. NATIONAL SERVING ONES TRAINING 2024 (Preliminary Information)

Dates: 7th - 10th of June
Location: CYC Phillip Island Adventure Resort: 1775-1801 Phillip Island Rd, Cowes, VIC
Training Cost: $335 per person
Registration: TBA

6. CAIRNS BLENDING CONFERENCE 2024

Dates: 26th & 28th of July
Location: Ramada Hotel 6/12 Florence St, Cairns City QLD 4870.
Training Cost: $350 per person
Schedule: Starts - Friday,7:30PM 26/07/24 Ends - Lord's Day, After lunch, 28/7/2024
Registration: Click here

INTERNATIONAL ANNOUNCEMENTS

1. PARTICIPATION IN THE SUMMER 2024 PARIS OLYMPIC DISTRIBUTION 

The Olympics will be returning to Europe in 2024 and will be hosted in Paris, France. We believe this is a wonderful opportunity prepared by the Lord as the Lord of the harvest. The saints are preparing to distribute free copies of the New Testament Recovery Version during the Torch Relay and the Olympic and Paralympic Games.

We would encourage all the saints to open to the regarding this next milestone in the Lord's move in Europe, and we would like to invite the saints in the Lord's recovery to join us in this labour next year by praying, giving and going.

For more details, please click here 

2. NATIONAL CONFERENCE  MARCH 2024 (NZ)

The National Conference will be held 29-31 March 2024 (Easter weekend) at Hamilton Boys’ High School, which is adjacent to the New Zealand Training Centre in Hamilton. Brothers Ray Mulligan (from Dublin) and Moses Chu (from Taiwan) will travel to New Zealand to give this conference in person.

The National Conference will be conducted in both a physical format and an online format. For the sake of blending and fellowship among the churches, we encourage saints within New Zealand to seize this opportunity of being together by attending this conference physically.

For more details, please click here

AUDIO AND VIDEO RECORDINGS FROM RECENT TRAININGS AND CONFERENCES 

1. Parents and Serving One's Conference 2023 click here

2. Encouraging the saints to get into the Life Studies (By Brother Minoru Chen)

LSM app for reading 500 life-studies is ready to download click here.

GENERAL INFORMATION


A. REGULAR MEETINGS OF THE CHURCH

Prayer Meeting (English)
Tuesday 7:30pm at the meeting hall and on Zoom (details below).
Prayer Meeting (Chinese)
Friday 9pm on WeChat. If you wish to attend please contact Mark Lam or Sister Zhi Bing and they will add you to the WeChat group.
Lord's Table and Prophesying Meeting
Lord's Day 10:00am at the meeting hall and on Zoom (details below).

B. CHURCH IN CANBERRA VARIOUS OFFERING ACCOUNTS

Please click here

C. ZOOM MEETING DETAILS

To join, click this link https://us02web.zoom.us/j/86759516115?pwd=RGQrKzJWWkRtTXVkeS9ZNXdSSmwxdz09
Meeting ID: 867 5951 6115 
Passcode: Eph4:16

D. ONLINE ANNOUNCEMENT

The announcement page on the church in Canberra website (https://www.churchincanberra.org/announcements) requires the password, 'canberra'.

E. LIST OF ACT SUBURBS AND DISTRICTS 

Through the burden released at recent conferences and the prayer of the saints we look to the Lord for the increase of his testimony in Canberra. There is the need for much prayer that the lord would gain his testimony across the whole of the ACT. The document linked here contains a full list of the ACT Districts and Divisions (Suburbs) to aid in your prayer for his move in Canberra.

Past announcements can be found at the church website: https://www.churchincanberra.org/announcements 

(Please refer to weekly email announcement for login password) 

 

From coordinating ones, on behalf of the Church in Canberra 







This email was sent to <<Email Address>>

item.title: March Retreat, Love Feast and Church Outing
item.description:
March Retreat, Love Feast and Church Outing

March Retreat, Love Feast and Church Outing


Praise the Lord Saints,

This email gives details regarding the upcoming retreat and Church Outing.

Retreat
Saints from Sydney and Newcastle will be visiting Canberra to experience the richness of our Lord Jesus Christ with us. There will be messages for spiritual nourishment, sightseeing and recreational activities. This retreat is open for all university aged students, year 11 & 12 students and young working Christians.

Location:  Canberra Meeting Hall
Cost: $15 for Canberra and Wagga, payment on arrival
Dietary requirements: We can provide gluten and dairy free options by request
Schedule: click here
Registration: click here (No registration needed for the church outing sessions on LD)

Church Outing
All saints are welcome to join the outing with the visiting young people on Saturday.

Location:  Lenox Gardens (click here for maps)
Food: All provided (BBQ)
Schedule: 12pm - 3pm, Saturday the 30th of March
Bring: Please bring a picnic blanket to share if possible.
Activity: Outing will be followed by a walking tour of the parliamentary triangle with the visiting saints. Local saints are welcome to join.

Lord's Day Change of Schedule
10:30am - Lord's Table Meeting 
12:30pm - Love Feast (see below)

Serving during the retreat 
Friday dinner and Lord's Day lunch will be a love feast. We encourage the saints to bring a dish for at least 10-15 people. Please let the coordinators know what you will bring be Wednesday evening so more food can be organised if needed.

Friday Dinner
Coordinator: April H & Len Steer
Bring food to the hall at 5:45

Lord's Day Lunch
Coordinator: April E & Bing

In Him,

The Brothers in Canberra






This email was sent to <<Email Address>>
